content: **knitted blanket with texture for baby piece is knitted in drops merino extra fine ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern me-067-by yarn group b ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** width approx 45 - 65 cm = 17 3/4 25 1/2 length approx 52 - 80 cm = 20 1/2 31 1/2 **materials** drops merino extra fine from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 200-300 g color 26 pistachio **knitting gauge** 20 stitches in width and 26 row vertically with pattern a 1 = 10 x 10 cm = 4 x 4 needles drops circular needle size 4 5 mm = us 7 length 80 cm = 32 needle size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm = 4 switch to larger needles if you have too few stitches on 10 cm = 4 switch to smaller needles
